description: Document representing a variation attribute value.

description.description: The localized description of the variation value.

abs_url.description: The absolute URL with request protocol

dis_base_url.description: The DIS base URL only for product images

image.description: The first product image for the configured viewtype and this variation value.

abs_url.description: The absolute URL with request protocol

dis_base_url.description: The DIS base URL only for product images

image_swatch.description: The first product image for the configured viewtype and this variation value. (typically the swatch image)

name.description: The localized display name of the variation value.

orderable.description: A flag indicating whether at least one variant with this variation attribute value is available to sell.

position.description: The position of the value among all values of a variation attribute.
